thread.title: Exciting Halftime Acts on Tap for Five Upcoming Women's and Men's Hoops Games
thread.title_full: Exciting Halftime Acts on Tap for Five Upcoming Women's and Men's Hoops Games

author: Official Site of the Rockets
title: Exciting Halftime Acts on Tap for Five Upcoming Women's and Men's Hoops Games
text:
TOLEDO, Ohio — The University of Toledo Athletic Department will have an exciting lineup of halftime entertainment for upcoming Rocket men's and women's basketball games at Savage Arena. Fans of all ages will be treated to unforgettable performances that add even more energy to a thrilling Rocket Basketball experience with both programs competing for the top spot in the Mid-American Conference.
Halftime Acts Schedule
Saturday, Jan. 18 – Women's Basketball vs. Ohio (2:00 p.m.)
Experience the jaw-dropping Tron Bike performance, a dazzling display of futuristic LED choreography and precision riding that has captivated audiences worldwide.
